function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Aerosols remaining in the air after a person leaves a room, potentially remaining airborne for hours.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Characteristics of covid-19 threatening humanity due to its survival on different materials for hours and days","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the transmission of infection through air circulation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistency in virus survival due to environmental factors","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through the air and contaminated surfaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of sars-cov-2 in air conditioning systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heat stress in non-air-conditioned places","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through the air due to airborne transmission of particles less than 5 µm in size","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 due to aerosol droplets","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of routine disinfection and ventilation in occupied rooms","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased frequency of covid-19 infection in cold and dry conditions","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in outdoor air between neighboring apartments","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fan-assisted natural ventilation increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to low viral concentration in high-density residential neighborhoods","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in air samples collected from patient’s rooms in hospitals","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of indoor surfaces and air with covid-19 virus","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High viral loads found in specific areas like toilets, bathrooms, and staff areas","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within a community due to shared building infrastructure","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased airflow speed in pipes due to toilet flushing transmitting covid-19 between apartments","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of covid-19 in centrally conditioned hospital air ducts","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of coronavirus through air conditioning systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 infection spread due to poor ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air and surfaces in healthcare facilities and nursing homes","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hvac system’s role in spreading infected droplets in indoor environments","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of aerosols in air-conditioned spaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor spread of infectious diseases by the conditions of hvac systems.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential health risk of respiratory virus transmission in air-conditioned rooms.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Control of indoor temperature and humidity during the epidemic period.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration and aerosol exposure","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for cost-efficient interventions for indoor transmission of respiratory infections","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recycled air in ventilation and air conditioning systems can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in indoor spaces can lead to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate control of airflow and airspeed can lead to the transport of virus-carrying particles within indoor spaces.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of pressure differences between zones in the building.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation of spaces with outdoor air.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of uv-c for air sterilization.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air supply leading to poor ventilation and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate operation of hvac systems leading to poor ventilation and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate temperature and humidity setpoints leading to discomfort and potential health risks.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure differential leading to potential for cross-contamination of air between safe and unsafe areas.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the building","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air from toilet facilities","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leakage in heat recovery equipment","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regular inspection and maintenance of water seals leading to potential water leaks and ingress of contaminants.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of temperature and relative humidity leading to suboptimal conditions for disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to indoor air stagnation and high pathogen concentration.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to maintain negative pressure in the toilet.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"}]}
